dashboard.label: Edge Sensor Array
dashboard.description: Plots all sensors on the edge device over time.
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_GPbWfZ2v":{"type":"viz.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_dxaJYVPh"},"title":"Temperature","options":{"chart.nullValueMode":"connect","axisTitleX.text":"Time","axisTitleY.text":"Temperature (F)","legend.placement":"none"}},"viz_B8U8CsjW":{"type":"viz.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_NQDIH11l"},"title":"Pressure","options":{"chart.nullValueMode":"connect","axisTitleX.text":"Time","axisTitleY.text":"Pressure (Pascal)","legend.placement":"none"}},"viz_dlzPZUDo":{"type":"viz.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_5A6UDffi"},"title":"Humidity","options":{"chart.nullValueMode":"connect","axisTitleX.text":"Time","axisTitleY.text":"Humidity (%)","legend.placement":"none"}},"viz_XhxPcmVw":{"type":"viz.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_GTfty2We_ds_5A6UDffi"},"title":"Volatile Organic Compounds","options":{"chart.nullValueMode":"connect","axisTitleX.text":"Time","axisTitleY.text":"Sensor (Ohm)","legend.placement":"none"}},"viz_wjYMCAr6":{"type":"viz.line","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_QhMCqlLN_ds_5A6UDffi"},"title":"Ambient Light Sensor - Infrared & Visible","options":{"chart.nullValueMode":"connect","axisTitleX.text":"Time","axisTitleY.text":"Integral","legend.placement":"bottom"}},"viz_oho7BGBV":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Arm + Splunk
Edge Sensor Array Demo","textColor":"#ffffff"}},"viz_HzvMjTvy":{"type":"viz.img","options":{"preserveAspectRatio":true,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://613a58600bff39218b4dfd01"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_dxaJYVPh":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index="main" AND source="/var/log/sensor_data"| timechart span=$text_timespan$ avg(temperature)"},"name":"Temperature"},"ds_NQDIH11l":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index="main" AND source="/var/log/sensor_data" 
| timechart span=$text_timespan$ avg(pressure)"},"name":"Pressure"},"ds_5A6UDffi":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index="main" AND source="/var/log/sensor_data" 
| timechart span=$text_timespan$ avg(humidity)"},"name":"Humidity"},"ds_GTfty2We_ds_5A6UDffi":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index="main" AND source="/var/log/sensor_data" 
| timechart span=$text_timespan$ avg(voc)"},"name":"VOC"},"ds_QhMCqlLN_ds_5A6UDffi":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index="main" AND source="/var/log/sensor_data" 
| timechart span=$text_timespan$ avg(als_inf_vis) avg(als_inf) 
| rename avg(als_inf_vis) AS "Infrared+Visible" 
| rename avg(als_inf) AS "Infrared""},"name":"ALS"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-4h@m,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_QmlRr2GA":{"options":{"defaultValue":"5m","token":"text_timespan"},"title":"Time Span Per Data Point","type":"input.text"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"backgroundColor":"#0877a6"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_GPbWfZ2v","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":10,"w":580,"h":240}},{"item":"viz_B8U8CsjW","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":260,"w":580,"h":240}},{"item":"viz_dlzPZUDo","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":260,"w":580,"h":240}},{"item":"viz_XhxPcmVw","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":510,"w":580,"h":240}},{"item":"viz_wjYMCAr6","type":"block","position":{"x":600,"y":510,"w":580,"h":240}},{"item":"viz_oho7BGBV","type":"block","position":{"x":10,"y":50,"w":280,"h":80}},{"item":"viz_HzvMjTvy","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":90,"h":60}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_QmlRr2GA"]},"description":"Plots all sensors on the edge device over time.","title":"Edge Sensor Array"}
